overview: An evil feudal lord rapes a village girl on her wedding night and proceeds to ruin her and her husband's lives. After she's eventually banished from her village, the girl makes a pact with the devil to gain magical ability and take revenge.
tagline: A soul wandering in love… Belladonna, a flower that blooms with the sap of tears…
cast: Aiko Nagayama|Tatsuya Nakadai|Takao Ito|Masaya Takahashi|Shigako Shimegi
